resources.string: This project was developed by students \n of the Murmansk Arctic State University.

"Mode" allows you to switch between "Normal" and "Engineering" modes 
 Use "Normal" mode for basic mathematical operations, "Engineering" - for complex calculations. 
 Sine - press button "sin", enter the number and press button "=" 
 Cosine - press button "cos", enter the number and press button "=" 
 Tangent - press button "tan", enter the number and press button "=" 
 Logarithm - press button "log", enter the number and press button "=" 
 Natural logarithm - press button "ln", enter the number and press button "=" 
 Factorial - enter the number, press button "tan" and press button "=" 
 Degree of n - enter the number, press button "x^n", enter the number of degree and press button "=" 
 Square root - enter the number, press button "x^n" and press button "=" 
 Degree of reckoning n - enter the number, press button "X_n", enter the number of degree and press button "=" 
 ÐŸ - number of PI 
 Addition of numbers addition - enter the number, press button "+", enter the number and press button "=" 
 Subtraction of numbers - enter the number, press button "-", enter the number and press button "=" 
 Multiplicative of numbers - enter the number, press button "*", enter the number and press button "=" 
 Division of numbers - enter the number, press button "/", enter the number and press button "=" Light theme - press button "Light" 
 Dark theme - press button "Dark" 
 Kids theme - press button "Kids" 
 Deleting a number - press button "C" 
 Deleting a string of numbers - press button "AC" 
 Copy - press button "Copy" 
 Paste - press button "Paste" 
 Info - press button "Info"
